comment: I am on Flight tomorrow am and the delta app shows Econ comfort seats avail , yet I can t change to one ... can you please help ? Confirm
amr:
# ::snt I am on Flight tomorrow am and the delta app shows Econ comfort seats avail , yet I can t change to one ... can you please help ? Confirm
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / and
            :op1 (b / be-located-at-91
                  :ARG1 (ii / i)
                  :ARG2 (f / fly-01)
                  :time (t / tomorrow))
            :op2 (s / show-01
                  :ARG0 (a2 / app
                        :mod (d / delta))
                  :ARG1 (a3 / avail-01
                        :ARG2 (s2 / seat
                              :purpose (c / comfort-01)
                              :mod (p / product
                                    :name (n / name
                                          :op1 "Econ")))))
            :concession-of (p2 / possible-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG1 (c2 / change-01
                        :ARG0 ii
                        :ARG1 ii
                        :ARG2 (s3 / seat
                              :mod c))))
      :snt2 (p3 / possible-01
            :polarity (a4 / amr-unknown)
            :ARG1 (h / help-01
                  :polite +
                  :ARG0 (y / you))
            :polarity (a5 / amr-unknown))
      :snt3 (c3 / confirm-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 y))

comment: Hi , Larry . I see that the complimentary upgrade request has been made , however , the seats showing as available are unassigned seats . If the seats become available tomorrow the gate agent will clear the request based on the Medallion tiers . HFG
amr:
# ::snt Hi , Larry . I see that the complimentary upgrade request has been made , however , the seats showing as available are unassigned seats . If the seats become available tomorrow the gate agent will clear the request based on the Medallion tiers . HFG
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / say-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (h / hi)
            :ARG2 (p / person
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Larry")))
      :snt2 (c / contrast-01
            :ARG1 (s2 / see-01
                  :ARG0 ii
                  :ARG1 (r / request-01
                        :ARG1 (u / upgrade-02)
                        :ARG1-of (c2 / complimentary-00)))
            :ARG2 (s3 / seat
                  :ARG1-of (a / assign-01
                        :polarity -)
                  :ARG1-of (s4 / show-01
                        :ARG2 (a2 / available-02
                              :ARG2 s3))))
      :snt3 (c3 / clear-01
            :ARG0 (a3 / agent
                  :mod (g / gate))
            :ARG1 (r2 / request-01)
            :ARG1-of (b / base-02
                  :ARG2 (t / tier
                        :mod (m2 / medallion)))
            :condition (b2 / become-01
                  :ARG1 (s5 / seat)
                  :ARG2 (a4 / available-02
                        :ARG2 s5)
                  :time (t2 / tomorrow)))
      :snt4 (p2 / product
            :name (n2 / name
                  :op1 "HFG")))
